SummaryEnglish: The story takes place in the barbaric era where Emperor Yan and Emperor Huang lived. At the time of the fierce competition in the Central Plains, the world's recognized leader - Shennong Emperor passed away, and the various ethnic groups of gold, wood, water, fire, and earth were all eager to move. In the turbulent era, the young Tuoba Ye emerged from the sky and, by chance, received the inheritance of Emperor Shennong's will, embarking on an exciting legendary journey.
Aliases: In Search of the Sacred and Anecdotes about Spirits and Immortals
Record(s) of Searching for the Spirits
